nodes.text: The Hidden Daggers were a pirate organization active in the Corellian system at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

The organization maintained a strong presence in the Binayre Razorcat quadrant and in The Void. Members of the Hidden Daggers were also sometimes seen around major cities on Corellia. Some of their starfighters were even spotted near an Imperial space station in the restricted Dathomir system.

In space battles, the Hidden Daggers flew M3-A Scyk fighters, T-65 X-wing starfighters, G1-M4-C Dunelizard fighters, BTL-S3 Y-wing starfighters, Rihkxyrk assault fighters, Firespray-31-class starships, YT-1300 freighters, Ye-4 gunships and Warlord Heavy Cruisers.

Some time during 1 ABY, CorSec Sergeant Rhea ordered an attack on several leaders of the Hidden Daggers to combat the increasing pirate activity in the system. A skilled CorSec pilot managed to engage and kill the Hidden Daggers Eliminator and the Hidden Dagger captains Russ Grimblade, Xopw Laow, Mori and Owpa Awoz.
In the same year, they co-operated with Galactic Vacant Building Demolitions, demolishing abandoned buildings using aerial bombardment.

The Hidden Daggers are one of various thug groups that can be found in Corellian cities in Star Wars Galaxies. With the addition of space sectors in the first expansion, Jump to Lightspeed, Hidden Daggers starfighters were added to the Corellian and Dathomir systems. They were also featured in several CorSec pilot missions. When Chapter 8: The Nova Orion Crisis added various space-based kill collections to the game in January 2007, additional Hidden Daggers starfighters, transports and gunships were added to all star systems in Star Wars Galaxies.
The group is also mentioned in "Move It or Lose It", a small in-universe introduction to the 2007 House Pack-Up operation in Star Wars Galaxies.
